item.title: This Is the Commodore Comeback Fans Have Waited for—but the Odds Are Still Against It
item.description: After years of mismanagement and questionable product tie-ins, the 80s computer brand is back, now with a fan at the helm. But is the appetite for retro gaming still big enough for it to succeed?
